#summary Steps to download and install the hale-aloha-cli-pichu "Pichu" system.
#labels Featured

*Table of Contents* 
<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= 1.0 Download =

Download the latest distribution of the hale-aloha-cli-pichu program from the [http://code.google.com/p/hale-aloha-cli-pichu/downloads/list Downloads] page.

Unzip the distribution in a directory of your choice.

= 2.0 Install =

Find the file named `hale-aloha-cli-pichu.jar` in the top-level directory of the distribution.

In the top-level directory, use a terminal program to invoke the following: `java -jar hale-aloha-cli-pichu.jar`
